techmeme.title: Some say ChatGPT fueled their loved ones' spiritual delusions; experts warn AI's human-like chats can exacerbate existing psychological vulnerabilities (Miles Klee/Rolling Stone)

Sources: Anysphere, maker of AI coding tool Cursor, raised $900M at a $9B valuation, up from $2.5B in January, led by Thrive, with a16z and Accel participating (Financial Times)
The biggest deepfake porn site on the internet, Mr. Deepfakes, says it is shutting down permanently because a "critical service provider" stopped serving it (Emanuel Maiberg/404 Media)
